headline: Ukraine Push  Began in May, Bolton Writes
abstract: The president asked his national security adviser last spring in front of other senior advisers to pave the way for a meeting between Rudolph Giuliani and Ukraine’s new leader.
lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON — More than two months before he asked Ukraine’s president to investigate his political opponents, President Trump directed John R. Bolton, then his national security adviser, to help with his pressure campaign to extract damaging information on Democrats from Ukrainian officials, according to an unpublished manuscript by Mr. Bolton.
keywords: Trump-Ukraine Whistle-blower Complaint and Impeachment Inquiry
The Room Where It Happened: A White House Memoir (Book)
